strings.ChangelogContent:
- full support for soundcloud is here. you now can save your favorite songs from there, if you want to.
- added ability to download full audios from tiktok/douyin, and made tiktok audio downloads better in general.
- did you know that there's an audio download mode in cobalt? if you didn't, there's now a tooltip that shows you how to switch between modes.
- added length limit to conversion of audios, because converting a 3 hour audio to wav will give you a 4gb file, and that's just unreasonable. you can still download audio in original (best) format without any limits.
- if best and preferred audio format match, cobalt won't needlessly convert the audio anymore.
- fixed format override for ios, you still might have to toggle between them once.
- increased input area length limit on frontend because some reddit and soundcloud links wouldn't fit.
- version in settings now opens current commit page on github, instead of general commits page. it also opens in a new tab instead of replacing the current one.
- fixed some localization stuff in english, russian, and ukrainian. it's now easier to understand what mode is on, and general cobalt description in russian doesn't sound awkward anymore.
strings.FollowTwitter: follow cobalt's twitter account for polls, updates, and more: @justusecobalt
strings.AboutSummary: {appName} is your go-to place for social media downloads. zero ads, trackers, or any other creepy bullshit attached. simply paste a share link and you're ready to rock!
strings.EmbedBriefDescription: save content from social media without creeps following you around
strings.MadeWithLove: made with <3 by wukko and all contributors on github
strings.ErrorSomethingWentWrong: something went wrong and i couldn't get anything for you. you can try again, but if issue persists, please {ContactLink}.
strings.ErrorUnsupported: it seems like this service is not supported yet or your link is invalid.
strings.ErrorBrokenLink: {s} is supported, but something is wrong with your link. maybe you didn't copy it fully?
strings.ErrorNoLink: i can't guess what you want to download! please give me a link.
strings.ErrorPageRenderFail: something went wrong and page couldn't render. if it's a recurring or critical issue, please {ContactLink}. it'd be useful if you provided current commit hash ({s}) and error recreation steps. thank you :D
strings.ErrorRateLimit: you're making way too many requests. calm down and try again in a few minutes.
strings.ErrorCouldntFetch: couldn't fetch metadata. check if your link is correct and try again.
strings.ErrorLengthLimit: current length limit is {s} minutes. what you tried to download is longer than {s} minutes. pick something else to download!
strings.ErrorBadFetch: something went wrong with info fetching. you can try a different format and resolution or just try again later.
strings.ErrorCorruptedStream: this download is unfortunately corrupted. try again or try a different format and resolution.
strings.ErrorNoInternet: there's no internet or {appName} api is down. check your connection and try again.
strings.ErrorCantConnectToServiceAPI: i couldn't connect to {s} api. seems like either {s} is down or {appName} server ip got blocked. try again later.
strings.ErrorEmptyDownload: there's nothing to download. try something else!
strings.ErrorLiveVideo: i can't download a live video. wait for stream to finish and try again.
strings.ErrorNoType: there's no such expected response type.
strings.AccessibilityKeepDownloadButton: keep the download button always visible
strings.SettingsEnableDownloadPopup: ask for a way to save
strings.AccessibilityEnableDownloadPopup: ask what to do with downloads
strings.SettingsFormatDescription: select webm if you need max quality available. webm videos are usually higher quality but ios devices can't play them natively.
strings.SettingsQualityDescription: if selected resolution isn't available, closest one gets picked instead. if you want to post a youtube video on twitter, then select a combination of mp4 and 720p. twitter likes videos like that way more.
strings.DonateDescription: i don't really like crypto in its current state, but it's the only reliable way for me to receive money and pay for anything abroad.
strings.LinkGitHubIssues: >> report issues and check out the source code on github
strings.LinkGitHubChanges: >> see previous changes and contribute on github
strings.LinkDonateContact: >> let me know if currency you want to donate isn't listed
strings.NoScriptMessage: {appName} uses javascript for api requests and interactive interface. you have to allow javascript to use this site. we don't have any ads or trackers, pinky promise.
strings.DownloadPopupDescriptionIOS: since you have an ios device, you have to press and hold the download button and then select "download video" in appeared popup to save the video. this will be required for as long as apple forces safari webview upon all browser developers on ios.
strings.DownloadPopupDescription: download button opens a new tab with requested file. you can disable this popup in settings.
strings.DonateLinksDescription: donation links open in a new tab. this is the best way to donate money, if you want me to receive it directly.
strings.SettingsAudioFormatDescription: when best format is selected, you get audio in best quality available, because audio is kept in its original format. if you select anything other than that, you'll get a slightly compressed file.
strings.SettingsDisableChangelogOnUpdate: don't show changelog after major updates
strings.ErrorLengthAudioConvert: current length limit for audio conversion is {s} minutes. pick "best" format instead!
strings.SettingsAudioFullTikTokDescription: this audio is most often music or original sound used in video. aka audio without voiceover, tts, or trimming will be downloaded, if it's available, of course.
